javax.microedition.rms

Interface ExtendedRecordListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RecordListener

    public interface ExtendedRecordListener
extends RecordListener
    The ExtendedRecordListener interface extends the RecordListener interface to provide additional event handling capabilities for record store operations. It includes constants representing various record store events and methods to handle these events.

    • Method Detail

      • recordEvent

        void recordEvent(int eventType,
                 long timestamp,
                 RecordStore recordStore,
                 int recordId)
        Handles a record event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The type of the event (e.g., RECORD_ADD, RECORD_CHANGE, etc.).
        timestamp - The timestamp of the event.
        recordStore - The RecordStore where the event occurred.
        recordId - The ID of the record involved in the event.

      • recordStoreEvent

        void recordStoreEvent(int eventType,
                      long timestamp,
                      java.lang.String recordStoreName)
        Handles a record store event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The type of the event (e.g., RECORDSTORE_OPEN, RECORDSTORE_CLOSE, etc.).
        timestamp - The timestamp of the event.
        recordStoreName - The name of the RecordStore where the event occurred.
